column4: On Use: Discard a Card and gain +1 Dice Power
On Use: Discard a Card and restore 10 Flow
On Use: Discard all cards and gain more Power depending on cards discarded: 1-3 gives +2 Dice Power, 4-6 gives +3 Dice Power, 7+ gives +4 Dice Power
On Discard: Gain +1 Strength this round
